title: Charmsukh - Aate Ki Chakki (Part-2)
description: Jethani's idea of making money out of the aate ki chakki works wonders and she gets ample time in self satisfaction. But Devrani won't accept her lone joyride. Witness how the two women indulge in a cold war to gain control in "Charmsukh - Aate Ki Chakki Part 2"!

title: Radhe: Your Most Wanted Bhai
description: A maverick cop hunts down drug-dealing gangsters.

title: Oxygen
description: A woman wakes in a cryogenic chamber with no recollection of how she got there, and must find a way out before running out of air.

title: Wild Dog (Hindi Dubbed)
description: Wild Dog aka Vijay Varma is an NIA agent who’s brought back to field from a desk job to handle a terrorism case. Despite having a personal motive, he moves heaven and earth to ensure justice is served for the sake of the country.

title: Hum Bhi Akele Tum Bhi Akele
description: A homosexual boy. A lesbian girl. A road trip from New Delhi to Himachal which helps them discover the Love in friendship.

title: Time To Dance
description: The plot revolves around the life of a dancer girl. She meets and falls in love with a youngster. Their life revolves around dance. Things take a new turn as unexpected events happen in their life.

title: Milestone
description: As soon as veteran driver Ghalib’s truck touches the 500,000 kilometers mark - a record at his company - he is struck by a sudden pain in his back. As Ghalib struggles with this ache, an existential threat begins to overwhelm him when he is asked to train a young new driver.

title: Ghar Pe Bataao
description: After 5 years of their relationship, the girl struggles to convince the boy to apprise his parents about them. The boy seems to be dithering and stalling because he is aware the full weight of an inter faith marriage would do to his parents. But the girl has made up her mind. It's now or never and she will push through.

title: B.A. Pass 3
description: BA Pass 3 narrates the story of a jobless Anshul and how his life changes upside down when he meets a married woman and gets into a relationship with her.

title: Things Heard & Seen
description: Catherine Clare reluctantly trades life in 1980s Manhattan for a remote home in the tiny hamlet of Chosen, New York, after her husband George lands a job teaching art history at a small Hudson Valley college. Even as she does her best to transform the old dairy farm into a place where young daughter Franny will be happy, Catherine increasingly finds herself isolated and alone. She soon comes to sense a sinister darkness lurking both in the walls of the ramshackle property—and in her marriage to George.

title: Tom Clancy's Without Remorse
description: An elite Navy SEAL uncovers an international conspiracy while seeking justice for the murder of his pregnant wife.

title: Ape vs. Monster
description: An ape crash-lands on Earth, which creates a sludge that makes him and a passing lizard grow to giant-size, resulting in a fight for dominance.

title: Mumbai Saga
description: The film, set in the 1980s and 90s, chronicles the transformation of Bombay to Mumbai. The story is a cat and mouse game between a deadly don, Amartya Rao, who doesn’t think twice before killing, and there’s nobody who could stop him and a cop, who is dogging his every step.

title: Justice Society: World War II
description: While speeding off to help in an impromptu battle, The Flash blazes and rips through time, only to find himself dropped into the middle of World War II. It’s here that The Flash meets Wonder Woman and her top secret team, known as the Justice Society of America. Witness the raging tides of war, gripping combat and the velocity of valor as The Flash fights to get back to his own timeline!

title: Mortal Kombat
description: Washed-up MMA fighter Cole Young, unaware of his heritage, and hunted by Emperor Shang Tsung's best warrior, Sub-Zero, seeks out and trains with Earth's greatest champions as he prepares to stand against the enemies of Outworld in a high stakes battle for the universe.

title: Golden Arm
description: A tough lady trucker trains her girly best friend to compete in the National Ladies Arm Wrestling Championship.

title: VanRakshak
description: Van Rakshak - The Forest Guard is not just a fictional tale of 'Chiranjilal Chouhan' from Himachal Pradesh, it is the reality of today, a reality check which all of us, the human race badly needs at this point of time. This film is based on Environment Conservation, Global Warming and Climate Change that shows the battle of a forest guard who fought to save his motherland till his last breath.

title: Stowaway
description: A three-person crew on a mission to Mars faces an impossible choice when an unplanned passenger jeopardizes the trip. Facing dwindling resources and a potentially fatal outcome, the crew is forced to make an impossible decision.
